rewards.comment: This table determines how much Gold is awarded for a successful quest. Grouped trios are for LENGTH s/m/l, successive groups are for DIFFICULTY 1,2,3,4,5,6 note blanks
This table determines how much Resolve XP is awarded for a successful quest. ROWS are DIFFICULTY, COLs are QUEST LENGTH

trinket_chance_table.comment: ROWS are DIFFICULTY, COLs are QUEST LENGTH
